label: ProductFinishingTreatment
comment: Improving measures for manufactured components or products to meet end use requirements.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: A piece of written, printed or electronic matter that provides information or evidence that a process has met required criteria.
A prominent attribute or aspect of an object, such as recyclability of a product, which can meet customer needs without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.
A substance from which something is or could be made.

referencedBy.comment: A product finishing treatment applied during this production process.
